item.title: Huffman coding algorithm
item.description: The Huffman coding is an algorithm that is used for lossless data compression, such as gzip or PNG image format.

item.title: Jump table (branch table)
item.description: The jump table is a method to transfer program control to another code block using a table of branch or jump instructions.

item.title: Retry strategies and patterns
item.description: Provide common retry strategies and patterns such as fibonacci, exponential, linear, polynomial
